alert.note: Alert for West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 30 at 2:51PM MST until January 31 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches. Winds gusts to 50 mph. Low visibility in blowing snow. * WHERE...Bad Rock Canyon, Essex, Highway 83 Bigfork to Swan Lake, Marias Pass, and Polebridge. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 1 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
